headline: Harmon's Brunswick Stew
name: Harmon's Brunswick Stew
description: Brunswick stew doesn't get much easier than this recipe calling for cans of prepared beef bbq, pork bbq, crushed tomatoes, cream-style corn, and chicken.
recipeIngredient: 2 (5 ounce) cans white chicken chunks (such as Swanson®), drained
1 (10 ounce) can pork in barbeque sauce (such as Vietti®)
1 (10 ounce) can beef in barbeque sauce (such as Vietti®)

recipeInstructions.text: Melt butter in a skillet over medium-high heat. Saute onion in melted butter until tender, 5 to 7 minutes.

Stir sauteed onion, cream-style corn, crushed tomatoes, white chicken chunks, pork in barbeque sauce, beef in barbeque sauce, Worcestershire sauce, black pepper, salt, and hot sauce together in a slow cooker crock.
Cook on High until hot, at least 30 minutes.
